Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Provides for standardbred equine drug testing standards
Summary: Provides for standardbred equine drug testing standards by permitting the New York state gaming commission to participate in the interstate compact on anti-doping and drug testing standards.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to standardbred equine drug testing standards
